org.xbib.marc.io

Interface BytesReference

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BytesArray

    public interface BytesReference
    A reference to bytes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte get(int index)
      Returns the byte at the specified index.
      int indexOf(byte b, int offset, int len)
      Find the index of a given byte, in the given area.
      int length()
      The length.
      BytesReference slice(int from, int length)
      Slice the bytes from the from index up to length.
      byte[] toBytes()
      Returns the bytes as a single byte array.
      java.lang.String toUtf8()
      Converts to a string based on utf8.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        byte get(int index)
        Returns the byte at the specified index. Need to be between 0 and length.
        Parameters:
        index - index
        Returns:
        byte at specified index

      • length

        int length()
        The length.
        Returns:
        length

      • indexOf

        int indexOf(byte b,
            int offset,
            int len)
        Find the index of a given byte, in the given area.
        Parameters:
        b - the byte
        offset - offset
        len - len
        Returns:
        -1 if not found, otherwise the position, counting from offset

      • slice

        BytesReference slice(int from,
                     int length)
        Slice the bytes from the from index up to length.
        Parameters:
        from - from
        length - length
        Returns:
        bytes reference

      • toBytes

        byte[] toBytes()
        Returns the bytes as a single byte array.
        Returns:
        bytes

      • toUtf8

        java.lang.String toUtf8()
        Converts to a string based on utf8.
        Returns:
        UTF-8 encoded string
